title: 2 Keys Keyboard
content:
Initially on a notepad only one character 'A' is present. You can perform two operations on this notepad for each step:

: You can copy all the characters present on the notepad (partial copy is not allowed).
: You can paste the characters which are copied last time.

 
Given a number . You have to get exactly  'A' on the notepad by performing the minimum number of steps permitted. Output the minimum number of steps to get  'A'.
